text: Hélder Samir Lopes Semedo Fernandes, known as Samir (born 13 October 1988) is a Cape Verdean football player who plays for Sertanense. He also holds Portuguese citizenship. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Feirense on 23 January 2013 in a game against Leixões. ==References== ==External links== * Soccerway Profile Category:1988 births Category:Sportspeople from Praia Category:Footballers from Santiago, Cape Verde Category:Living people Category:Cape Verdean footballers Category:Odivelas F.C. players Category:Casa Pia A.C. players Category:GD Bragança players Category:C.D. title: Hélder Samir Lopes Semedo Fernandes
